author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Added infrastructure for reading and writing schema difference definitions.
- Implemented difference readers and writers for php_array and xml.
- Refactored comparation code to use structs instead of associative arrays.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Disallowed 'for' and 'do .. while', and added tests for it.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Updated error messages for the while loop.

author: sa:ez.no
msg: - Changed ezcSelectQuery unit tests to pass when run on SQLite.
Modified rightJoin() in ezcQuerySelectSqlite to match

author: sa:ez.no
msg: - Changed ezcQuerySelect select(), from(), where() methods.
Now they allowed to be invoked several times during building query.
